name: Bayou Fishing
description:
Bayou Fishing

Go fishing in the Bayou.

Controls
  • `W` to accelerate forward
  • `S` to accelerate backwards
  • `A` to turn left
  • `D` to turn right
  • `F` to fish
Credits
  • Airy Ambience - Marcelo Fernandez https://soundcloud.com/marcelofernandezmusic
  • hunted by the evil - Umplix
  • cracking sounds - Hansjörg Malthaner http://opengameart.org/users
